description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Handling the following main tasks:
              
              1.	Controlling vouchers
              
              -	Checking and classifying daily vouchers of the whole
              
              -	Arranging and filing vouchers, input sheets and other necessary documents
              
              -	Binding and storing vouchers centrally
              
              -	Checking cancellation and correction vouchers presented by transaction execution departments
              
              2.	Total proof
              
              -	Conducting proof and account proof
              
              -	Verifying transaction proof performed by transaction execution departments, and advising them of any inconsistency or irregularity
              
              3.	Controlling reconciliation of nostro/ vostro accounts and internal suspense accounts of the bank
              
              4.	Controlling ledger of fixed assets of the bank
              
              5.	Controlling all taxes of the bank, except Personal income tax (PIT)
              
              6.	Handling financial, accounting and tax reports to HO as periodically requested
              
              7.	Handling financial, accounting reports and statistic reports of the bank to local authorities
              
              8.	Handling upgrading/ modification of the accounting and statistic reporting system to local authorities
              
              9.	Cooperating with CPA (external auditor) for Financial Statements Audit
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	1- 3 years accounting experience in an international bank.
              
              -	University graduated from accounting major.
              
              -	Knowledgeable and passionate on general accounting.
              
              -	Attention to detail, carefulness, and discipline
              
              -	Teamwork oriented
              
              -	Well-organized and logical thinking
              
              -	Willing to work under pressure
              
              -	Proficient in English (strong English writing and reading skill)
              
              -	Sex: Either
